sentence.Network_en: Make them like tumbleweed , O my God, like chaff before the wind.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的神阿,求你叫他们像旋风的尘土, 像风前的碎秸.

sentence.Network_en: Tumbleweed wish everyone a wonderful Year of the Tiger ! Happy everyday!
sentence.Network_cn: 风滚草乐队祝大家虎年行大运,万事如意,心想事成!

list.abs: ...当然练了几个月的琴绝对是梅丽尔专业所体现，不过这和整体表演还是有区别的。当年奥斯卡的评价安妮特贝宁(美国美人)朱丽安摩尔(恋爱的终结)梅丽尔斯特里普(弦动我心)希拉里斯万克(男孩不哭)珍妮特麦克提尔(tumbleweeds)希拉里斯万克以一个无论难度还是冲击力都要超过对手数倍的角色战胜了四位顶级实力派赢得了奥斯卡，很值得的一尊奥斯卡。演得太好了。.

the coils of razor wire glint in the prairie sun like silver tumbleweeds piled against the tall chain-link perimeter fences of the forlorn Two Rivers Detention Facility in Hardin , Montana .成卷的剃须刀线闪耀在大草原的阳光下，犹如银色成堆的蒲公英映衬在凄凉的蒙大拿的哈丁双河监狱周边围墙的高高的链环下。

entry.tran: （生长于北美沙漠地区的）风滚草
entry.def: Tumbleweed is a plant that grows in desert areas in North America. It breaks off from its roots at the end of its life and then blows around on the ground.

means.word_mean: 1. any plant that breaks away from its roots in autumn and is driven by the wind as a light rolling mass
2. prickly bushy Eurasian plant; a troublesome weed in central and western United States
3. bushy annual weed of central North America having greenish flowers and winged seeds
4. bushy plant of western United States
